text:
QUESTION 172) An irrigated coffee producer in Minas Gerais received a statistical consulting report, including, among other information, the standard deviation of the productions of a crop of the wakes of his property. The plots have the same area of ​​30 000 m2 and the value obtained for the standard deviation was 90 kg/field. The producer must present the information about the production and variance of these productions in 60 kg per hectare bags (10 000 m2).
The variance of the production productions expressed in (bags/hectare) 2 is
A) 20.25.
B) 4.50.
C) 0.71.
D) 0.50.
E) 0.25.
